Text:
AstĂŠrix et le coup du menhir (1989)

Also Known As:
Asterix - Operation Hinkelstein (West Germany)
Asterix and the Big Fight
Combat des chefs, Le (France)
Runtime: 81 min
Country: France / West Germany

When the druid Panoramix is attacked by some roman soldiers, Obelix drives them away by throwing a menhir on them - which accidently hits Panoramix. After this the druid has lost his memory and can not remember the formula of his magic potions, especially the one which gives superhuman strength.


http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0096842/
